oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Honky-Tonk Holiday with Brazibilly - 2012-12-01
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Concert holiday performance by Brazilbilly featuring Jesse Lee Jones from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on December 1, 2012. Companion to a Marty Robbins exhibit.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Brazilbilly; Jesse Lee Jones; Rachel Hester;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress. Performances include partial recording of Who Am I?; Unidentified fiddle instrumental; Silver Bells (Rachel Hester); Silver Bells (instrumental-fiddle tune); Merry Christmas To You From Me; Blue Christmas; Band introductions and song excerpts from each; There's Trouble Brewing (Chris) ;The Christmas Song (instrumental); Rocking Around The Christmas Tree (Rachel Hester);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Brazilbilly; Jones, Jesse Lee; Hester, Rachel; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
